fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.salter.util

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.salter.util.Console

  • public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
    Console class is the GUI of this lottery software. It is used to collect input from the user.

        public Console()

    • Method Detail

      • getLottoType

        public static java.lang.String getLottoType()
        Method getLottoType asks user to choose which type of lotto game user wants to play. It keeps asking until valid option has been chosen.
        Returns:
        int array with the parameters for chosen game type

      • showRows

        public static java.lang.Boolean showRows()
        Method showRows checks if user wants to see the weekly rows.
        Returns:
        boolean value depending on the answer

      • readInt

        public static int readInt()
        Method readInt reads user input and returns it if it's of valid form.
        Returns:
        int type input

      • readInt

        public static int readInt(int min,
                          int max)
        Method readInt calls another method named readInt, which will in turn get valid type of user input (int). Then this readInt will check that the given input sets inside given range, if not, it outputs an error message regarding the situation and then loops another try.
        Parameters:
        min - argument, which sets the lower end of the range
        max - argument, which sets the upper end of the range
        Returns:
        int type input

      • getUserRow

        public static int[] getUserRow(int size,
                               int poolSize)
        Method getUserRow gets the lotto row user wants. It checks that user enters numbers within the set pool, and that user gives unique numbers for the row. With the valid input the method compiles a lottery rowsize for the user.
        Parameters:
        size - argument that takes in the length of the lottery row for the user
        poolSize - is the argument, that tells about the range where user can do the picking
        Returns:
        int array that represents user's lotto row
